original_text: And ye shall measure from without the city on the east side two thousand cubits, and on the south side two thousand cubits, and on the west side two thousand cubits, and on the north side two thousand cubits; and the city shall be in the midst: this shall be to them the suburbs of the cities.
korean_text: 성을 중앙에 두고 성 밖 동쪽으로 이천 규빗, 남쪽으로 이천 규빗, 서쪽으로 이천 규빗, 북쪽으로 이천 규빗을 측량할지니 이는 그들의 성읍의 들이며

sentences.original_text: And ye shall measure from without the city
on the east side two thousand cubits
and on the south side two thousand cubits
and on the west side two thousand cubits
and on the north side two thousand cubits
and the city shall be in the midst
this shall be to them the suburbs of the cities
